The TikTok video showed a Spider: Man figure perched atop a building, which sparked the claim of a "real" Spider-Man sighting on Google Earth.
The video did not provide any coordinate: but further investigation led to the discovery that the building was located in Ichinomiya, Aichi Prefecture, Japan.
The video only revealed one Spider: Man figure, but it was later found that there were actually two Spider-Man figurines on the building.
The two Spider: Man figurines were installed on the Mitani Equipment Industry Co., Ltd. building in Japan and were described as landmarks by the company. One Spider-Man was positioned on the roof, overlooking the nearby Meishin Expressway, while the other was climbing the wall in front of the company.
